  1. purejavahidapi

Uses of Package
purejavahidapi

Packages that use purejavahidapi
Package
Description
purejavahidapi
 
purejavahidapi.linux
 
purejavahidapi.macosx
 
purejavahidapi.shared
 
purejavahidapi.windows
 
  • Classes in purejavahidapi used by purejavahidapi
    Class
    Description
    DeviceRemovalListener
    An InputReportListener gets called when a USB device is un-plugged.
    HidDevice
    Instances of HidDevice represent a single physical USB HID device that has been opened for communication.
    HidDeviceInfo
    HidDeviceInfo instances represent all that can be found out about a specific connected USB HID device without actually opening it.
    InputReportListener
    An InputReportListener gets called from background thread attached to a HidDevice every time an input report is received from the tha associated USB device.
